abstract: The biggest debate at the Interactive Advertising Bureau conference was whether new ad exchanges and other quantitative systems strip the creativity from advertising and make it simply a commodity. On the other hand, one ad exec noted, gems are sold on exchanges, too.
snippet: The biggest debate at the Interactive Advertising Bureau conference was whether new ad exchanges and other quantitative systems strip the creativity from advertising and make it simply a commodity. On the other hand, one ad exec noted, gems are so...
lead_paragraph: Aside from the Microsoft bid for Yahoo, the biggest topic of conversation at the Interactive Advertising Bureau’s convention this week was pork bellies.

headline.main: Will Publishers Lose Their Bacon if Ads Are Traded Like Pork Bellies?
